thread.title: Sonus SBC 5000 Series, SBC 7000 and SBC SWe Release 5.0 Now Available
thread.title_full: Sonus SBC 5000 Series, SBC 7000 and SBC SWe Release 5.0 Now Available

title: Sonus SBC 5000 Series, SBC 7000 and SBC SWe Release 5.0 Now Available
text: Sonus SBC 5000 Series, SBC 7000 and SBC SWe Release 5.0 Now Available   Published on 2015-10-05 07:45:58 Sonus SBC 5000 Series, SBC 7000 and SBC SWe Release 5.0 Now... -- WESTFORD, Mass.,   Sonus Networks, Inc. Corporate Logo Sonus Networks, Inc. Corporate Logo  ><- stripped tags -> WESTFORD, Mass. ,   Key Takeaways: Sonus SBC 5000 Series, SBC 7000 and SBC Software edition (SWe) Session Border Controllers (SBC) Release 5.0 generally available. Simplifies interworking with BroadSoft and Microsoft UC applications. Bridges WebRTC world to SIP infrastructure. [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCb2NtVm1QVndpYUhSMGNEb3ZMM2QzZHk1emIyNTFjeTV1WlhRdlpXNWNJaUIwWVhKblpYUTlYQ0pmWW14aGJtdGNJajVUYjI1MWN5Qk9aWFIzYjNKcmN6d3ZZVDQ9fA==]], Inc. (Nasdaq: [[]]), [[]], announced today the general availability of the Sonus SBC 5000 Series, SBC 7000 and SBC Software edition (SWe) Session Border Controllers (SBCs) Release 5.0. This update provides new revenue opportunities for wireless service providers, offers Unified Communications (UC) migrations and broadens enterprise video interworking. Release 5.0 decreases the complexities around interworking multi-vendor wireless and UC applications and features: Enhanced revenue for service providers with wireless VoLTE interconnect; Interworking with BroadSoft's BroadWorks ® and BroadCloud ® offerings; New service support for SIP to WebRTC interworking; Lower migration costs by reusing existing customer equipment with Microsoft Lync 2010/2013 video relay; and Element Management Application (EMA) enhancements with simplified single sign-on and broader browser support, decreasing costs and increasing customer service. Quote: "SIP-based Unified Communications are accelerating globally," said David Tipping , Sonus vice president and general manager, Products. "Sonus' Release 5.0 simplifies deployments and broadens SBC interworking capabilities, allowing customers to rapidly unlock the cost savings Unified Communications brings at scale." Tags: Sonus Networks, SONS, Session Border Controller, SBC, SBC 5000 Series, SBC 7000, SBC Software edition, SBC SWe, WebRTC, BroadSoft, Element Management Application, EMA, SIP, VoLTE, Voice over LTE, Unified Communications, UC About Sonus: Sonus brings the next generation of Cloud-based SIP and 4G/VoLTE solutions to its customers by enabling and securing mission critical traffic for VoIP, video, IM and online collaboration. With Sonus, enterprises can intelligently secure and prioritize real-time communications, while service providers can deliver reliable, secure real-time services for mobile, UC and social applications. Sonus offers an award-winning portfolio of hardware-based and virtualized Session Border Controllers (SBCs), Diameter Signaling Controllers (DSCs), Network-as-a-Service (NaaS) capabilities, Policy/Routing servers and media/signaling gateways. Visit [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2RHRnlaMlYwUFNkZllteGhibXNuSUhKbGJEMWNJbTV2Wm05c2JHOTNYQ0lnYUhKbFpqMWNJbWgwZEhBNkx5OTNkM2N1YzI5dWRYTXVibVYwWENJK2QzZDNMbk52Ym5WekxtNWxkRHd2WVQ0PXw=]] or call 1-855-GO-SONUS.
